thread.title: How damage to Oroville Dam's main spillway turned into a crisis
thread.title_full: How damage to Oroville Dam's main spillway turned into a crisis

author: Matt Hamilton, Shelby Grad
title: How damage to Oroville Dam's main spillway turned into a crisis
text:
How damage to Oroville Dam's main spillway turned into a crisis Lake Oroville overflow Brian van der Brug / Los Angeles Times Water flows down the damaged main spillway of the Oroville Dam at 55,000 cubic feet per second into the Feather River. Water flows down the damaged main spillway of the Oroville Dam at 55,000 cubic feet per second into the Feather River. (Brian van der Brug / Los Angeles Times) Matt Hamilton and Shelby Grad Caption Weekend Roundup: 7 stories you can't miss 
The Patriots stun the Falcons with a history-making comeback , beating Atlanta in the game's first-ever overtime, California's gearing up to fight the Zika virus , a week in the life of P‑22 , Senate rebukes Elizabeth Warren , and welcome to the new Ikea . ICYMI: It's huge! California's emergency drought rules will be staying in place -- at least for the near future. An appeals court has ruled: Trump's travelban will remain blocked. Caption Weekend Roundup: 7 stories you can't miss 
The Patriots stun the Falcons with a history-making comeback , beating Atlanta in the game's first-ever overtime, California's gearing up to fight the Zika virus , a week in the life of P‑22 , Senate rebukes Elizabeth Warren , and welcome to the new Ikea . ICYMI: It's huge! California's emergency drought rules will be staying in place -- at least for the near future. An appeals court has ruled: Trump's travelban will remain blocked. Caption 90 seconds: 4 stories you can't miss 
An appeals court has ruled: Trump's travel ban will remain blocked . Arrests made by federal immigration officials sparked a protest in downtown Los Angeles . L.A. planning commissions approve most zoning change requests , a Times analysis finds. Can robots replace bees ? Caption 9th Circuit court refuses to reinstate travel ban 
A three-judge panel of the U.S. 9th Circuit Court of Appeals ruled that a Seattle federal judge’s earlier restraining order on the new policy should remain in effect while the judge further examines its legality.. 
A three-judge panel of the U.S. 9th Circuit Court of Appeals ruled that a Seattle federal judge’s earlier restraining order on the new policy should remain in effect while the judge further examines its legality.. Caption LaMelo Ball puts on a show 
He finishes with 27 points in Chino Hills victory 
He finishes with 27 points in Chino Hills victory Caption Immigration arrests in L.A. spark fear, outrage, but officials say they are routine 
Arrests sparked a protest in downtown Los Angeles Thursday evening. (Marcus Yam / Los Angeles Times)
